inn1.comm: Mashrafee Mortaza starts off the proceedings with a delivery on the hips and Upul Tharanga shuffles in to tuck it behind square-leg. Sanath Jayasuriya will be on strike.
No surprise. He starts off trying to murder a delivery outside off. Too wide to reach.
Jayasuriya decides to respect the line this time. Close to the off stump. Left alone.
Mortaza announces himself with a delivery that landed on a length outside off, skidded on the grass and moved away. Jayasuriya poked at it and is beaten
Jayasuriya makes up for his lack of feet movement in the previous delivery by moving well across to another length delivery outside off and defends watchfully
Another swing and a miss. Well outside off, invited a drive.

Steve Bucknor shows his presence. Appeal was made for a catch down the leg side, loud appeal mind you and Bucknor stares for some time, tilts his head to his left, and then extends his arms. Great start.
On the off, Jayasuriya moves towards the ball to dead-bat it away calmly to the off side.
bad ball, not a well-timed shot, almost a good stop at mid-on. It was a short delivery, should have been spanked away, Tharanga half-pulls, half -swats it to the mid-on
on the off, slightly fuller this time, pushed to point
much better ball by Rasel, On a length, around the off and middle, Jayasuriya stretches, made to stretch, forward at the last minute to tackle the away swing.
Rasel repeats the ball, Jayasuriya reproduces his forward defensive stroke
dabbed to third man. Another nice one in the channel outside off
Line and length perfect. Just outside off and Good length. Upul Tharanga respects both and shoulders arms.
Mortaza beats Jayasuriya with a slanted delivery outside off. Jayasuriya pushes across a bit late and ends up poking inside the line.

Appeal for lbw. If the previous went away this one jagged back in after landing on the seam on a length around the middle and leg. Jayasuriya is caught in his shuffle and hops a bit. Close call. It appeared as if it would have hit the leg stump. Maybe the height was the concern.
Another wide where Mortaza appeals for a catch and Bucknor declares a wide. Nice try Mortaza , It could have worked in the club level.
Just outside off, angling away, and Jayasuriya lets it go through

Apart from the long-hop first ball, Rasel has been impressive so far. This one was full on the middle and off and swung away late. Jayasuriya pushed forward and covered the swing well to push it away to covers.

Jayasuriya definitely agreed with me I think about Rasel's bowling. But he reacts in a different way. Thats why he is playing International cricket and I am doing ball by ball commentary. He runds down the track , upsets the rhythm of the bowler and carves one flat and fast over point
What does he do? Doesn't charge, lets the ball to come to him - it was just outside off- and with deft use of his wrists sends it behind point. Four more.
Good delivery that kicked from a length and caught Jayasuriya by surprise. He jabbed at it and the ball hit the gloves enroute to shortish fine-leg

Jayasuriya wants the strike badly. A dab to third man, just a run you would think but Jayasuriya hares down the track and turns for the possible second run if the fielder had buckled under pressure. he doesn't and it will be just a single.
Lands on a length on the middle, straightens and Tharanga pushes at it calmly
again it comes in after pitching on the middle and off, Tharanga is unable to force it away for a run
this one not only straightens but also kicks up and raps Tharanga on his pads. Going down.
Tharanga hops back to a back of length delivery to push it to the off side
Wicketkeeper is still up to the stumps. Fullish on the off and middle, pushed down the track
Rasel is not giving away anything for free. another length delivery that lands on the off stump line and comes in a touch. No room for any cut or drive. patted back quietly
yeah right. There you go. Here I am trying to praise him and then he goes on to bowl a short one. Not to Jayasuriya son. Biffed away over midwicket.
Outside off, kicks up a bit and Jayasuriya wrists it over backward point

Three runs and Rasel continues to bleed whenever he drags back the length. This was not all that short and was on the off stump line but Rasel's lack of pace meant Tharanga could stand up tall and punch it past covers
slightly fuller, punched to cover.
bad ball, good shot and great stop at short cover. It was wide, Tharanga drives it on the up and Ashraful dives to his right to make the stop.
better from Mortaza. On the off, pushed to Ashraful at short cover
Bucknor is not sure whether its a four or a six, signals four in the end. It was a slower ball, fullish off and Tharanga simply went through the line, over mid-off and almost over long-off.
Into his drive a bit early and the ball spoons up but falls short of mid-off
Tharanga likes that long-off boundary. Pings it again with another stroke that was hit cleanly through the line. Hit on the up.
beaten.... in the corridor of the uncertainity and Tharanga was uncertain on that occasion
Wide down the leg side. Happens when you are worried about the batsmen going after you.
Hmm... should have put that shortish delivery outside off for a four but the bottom-hand comes into that cut shot a bit too much and the ball rolls towards cover
Jayasuriya is bit too early into his drive but luckily for him the ball falls short of mid-on
on the middle and leg, tucked away behind square-leg
once again Rasel hits the back of length area and outside off as well. Tharanga forces it past point. Good shot but not a great ball.
Three runs but it was almost caught at short midwicket. Farhad dives to his right but is unable to get a hand to it. It was fullish on the middle and leg, Tharanga flicks aerially.
fuller in length. Good. On the middle and off. Great. Jayasuriya just pushes it back quietly.
Angling across, left alone.  Mortaza has had Tharanga in trouble whenever he has  managed to bring the ball back or straighten. Will he try again this over?
beaten... It landed on a length , on the off and shaped away and Tharanga, no foot movement whatsover, pushes at it

If you are the sorts who believes in moral victory you will judge that Mortaza won that round. It was fullish on the off and straightened slightly, Tharanga drove it away from his body and gets an inside edge that takes the ball to fine-leg
short outside off, even Jayasuriya's mom puts away those. Actually, not all that wide but the length allowed Jayasuriya to short-arm jab at it.
on the legs, Jayasuriya attempts to work it to the on side, doesn't connect and the ball rolls to the keeper' off the pads.
Tharanga charges down the track, Rasel holds back the length and the inside-edge takes the ball to midwicket

Rasel is again unlucky. He caught the leading edge of Tharanga but it lands in the no man's land in front of third man. It was fullish on the leg  and came in after pitching. Tharanga tries to swing it over the on side and is beaten by the movement
Hmm... Rasel continues to pull his hair out his head. Tharanga runs down the track and goes for a lofted drive. All fine but where is the ball? safely in the palms of the wicketkeeper.
Angled across Jayasuriya who pushes it straight to point.
length-delivery on the middle and leg, Jayasuriya doesn't go across the line, instead just leans forward and offers the full-face of the bat in defense.

Last time Mortaza tried a slower one it disappeared in the long-on area. this time, Jayasuriya tries to fetch it from outside off in an effort to swing it over midwicket, doesn't time it well and the ball rolls over to the on side
on the off, angling across, Jayasuriya pushes forward and plays it towards cover
Another appeal for a catch down the leg side. No, Bucknor didn't signal a no-ball, as it had brushed Jayasuriya's hips on the way
No hip this time but just the middle of the bat. Short again and Jayasuriya pulled it off his front foot.
on the legs, Tharanga decides to hand over the strike to Jayasuriya and tucks it to fine leg, Must have got tired of charging down only to meet air.
fullish on the off stump line, Tharanga offers the full face of the bat in defense
Again Rasel has Tharanga respecting him. Yes it was the full-length delivery on the stumps.
And again. They take a single but only because the timing of that off drive was awry that the ball rolled slowly to the right of mid-off and that gave them time to cross over
full in length but outside off, and Jayasuriya dabs it behind point .
fullish on the stumps, Jayasuriya pushes it back down the track
On the off, Tharanga is hurried in to his defensive stroke, gets an inside edge that takes the ball to square-leg
Farhad errs on length. Overpitches outside off and Tharanga goes for his favourite lofted off drive over the infield
on the legs, tucked behind square-leg, Tharanga wants a second, Jayasuriya doesn't
slips in a wide down the leg side. Ball bounds of the keeper's gloves and rolls to his right.
smart take by Khaled Mashud. Down the leg side. Bucknor not only extends his arms but also warns the bowler for running on to the danger area.
appeal for a lbw but going down leg. It was full and definitely a hint of late swing. Raza is bowling from around the stumps. Tharanga is beaten on his drive

Harper froze into a statue before suddenly coming alive to raise his finger. Bangladesh get rid of the danger man Jayasuriya. It was a full-length delivery on the off stump line that moved in late. It was that late movement that trapped Jayasuriya. He pushed at it, front foot across and forward, but the ball moved back in to trap him in front of middle.
This one straightens after landing on a length outside off, punched to point
Edged but no slip in place.
fullish on the off, pushed to covers
attempted flick shot and the ball rolls off the pads
another crashes into the pads but going down the leg side
Again Tharanga gets an edge, and there is no slip in place.
fullish on the middle, pushed back down the track
Slower one. just outside off and Tharanga pushes at it early. Just manages to steer it to point
Rasel swings this one in from the middle, Jayawardene flicks it past square-leg

Jayawardene charges down the track and flicks a fullish delivery effortlessly over square-leg. He is such an elegant batsmen. Especially his inside out drives against the spinners are worth thier weight in gold.
bit of width outside off and Jayawardene square-drives off his front foot. Lovely to watch.
slanted across, pushed to cover
slightly slower, on the off, Jayawardene has to wait for the ball to arrive and tries to dab it down to third man but can't beat point
smart work by Khaled Mashud. Tharanga misses an intended drive and Mashud, standing up, had the bails off in a flash. Tharanga has his back foot planted inside his crease though.
square-driven past point
length delivery on the off and middle, pushed back towards mid-on, Farhad tries to get across to reach the ball, even dives but doesn't stop. Not that the batsmen were looking for a run.
Jayawardene tries to force off his front foot, misses
catch it catch it was Khaled Mashud's call but Jayawardene had found the gap in the cover region. It was hit in the air, hence the agonised cry from behind the stumps, but through the gap.
driven to mid-off
pushed to point
beaten outside off and Mashud whips off the bails and appeals for a stumping. Bucknor turns it down. It was just outside off, didn't spin in and Tharanga was playing for the turn
Tharanga again pings the long-off fence. He hits that lofted drive pretty well. Through the line and over the infield. It was tossed up on the off and he creamed it over long-off
pushed to point
10 runs off the over. Slightly short and outside off, carved past point. No butchering that time, just placement.
beaten outside off as Jayawardene attempts to run that one to third man
hmm.. Jayawardene decides to take a bit of risk and pulls it off. He backs away to a short of length delivery just outside off and cuts it over point
Powerplay on in more ways than one. He plants his front foot forward and goes through the line. Over mid-off.
outside off, full in length, Mahela goes for a square-drive but misses.
Caught at fine-leg but by the ball-boy standing behind the ropes.  Jayawardene walks across his stumps and tries to heave across the line, gets a top-edge.
Bangladesh continue to bleed at Mohali. Caressed past the bowler, past the mid-off and into the fence
wide down the leg side, Mashud fails to gather it cleanly. No use blaming him as he was clearly unsighted by the batsman.
on the middle and leg, punched down the ground

dropped was it? It was an arm ball outside off, Jayawardene tries to cut, not sure whether he got an bottom-edge to it , Mashud fails to take it. Not sure whether he nicked that one. TV replays inconclusive.
fired in flat on the middle, turned to square-leg
flighted on a length around the off, pushed to cover
turned to short fine leg and they run with the stroke.
flighted outside off, driven to cover
much slower on the off and middle, dead-batted away
slightly quicker and flatter this time, pushed back down the track
comes down the track but can't quite get to the pitch, pushes it back to the bowler
Rafique keeps him on 49. This one was slower and on the off, Tharanga doesn't find any pace to work with, just pushes it towards midwicket
Jayawardene again takes the single off the first ball.
cant get it off this one. pushes it to midwicket
tossed up outside off, Tharanga goes for a drive, gets an inside edge onto his pads.
brings up his fifty - his fourth in ODIs- with a push down the ground.
Mahela's nice little cameo ends. Razzaq floats one outside off and Mahela sweeps it but straight into the waiting palms at short midwicket.
comes down the track, Rafique holds back the length and just pushed back down the track
driven down the ground.
on the leg and middle, worked past midwicket
overpitched outside off, driven to cover
pushed to mid-off
fired in flat on the middle, Sangakkara tries to work it to on side but cant beat the short midwicket
manages to beat that fielder this time. But then this delivery was on the leg and middle line, easy to turn it away&
on the legs, should have been put away for atleast a single but Tharanga can't beat the short fine-leg fielder
Sangakkara is contend to milk the spinner for singles. Sri Lanka are well placed as we approach the half-way mark.
full, driven to mid-on
sharp turn, lands on the off and spins past Sangakkara.
driven down to long-on
comes down the track, Rafique holds back the length and he ends up flicking it across past midwicket.
tossed up on off, swept to backward square leg
flatter on middle and off, driven to mid-on
tossed up outside off, defends with soft hands and they steal a run in front of point
middle and leg, flatter, turned in front of midwicket
again middle and leg, this time he steps forward and drives it to midwicket's left
bad ball, spins from middle way down leg, Sangkarra takes it
width offered outside off, goes for a cut, mistimes it but they still get one to point
tossed up on off, forward defense back to the bowler
tossed up on middle and off, swept around the corner
middle and leg, steps across the stumps and tickles it around the corner for four, good shot there
sweeps from outside off right to square leg
lands outside off and spins in sharply, looks to run it fine but cant time it well enough
tossed up on off, advances down the track and firmly drives to mid-off for one, thats the 150 for Sri Lanka, in good time too
flatter on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
width offered, cut down to the sweeper
flighted into middle and leg, advances, looks to flick, doesnt make good contact and the ball trickles to square leg where the fielder hurls in and throws but they make it
ditto same ball, this time they manage to beat the fielder and steal a very sharp run
spins from outside off, he goes to sweep, ball raps him high on the front pad, everyone goes up in appeal but that would have gone over the stumps
worked from middle and leg past square leg again
flatter on off stump, walks across and tucks it to square leg
tossed up on off, pushed into the covers to the left of the fielder there
spins in from outside off, but he makes room and glides that past point
flatter on middle and off, he walks into that shot and drives down to long-on
faster one with some bounce there, catches him by surprise as he goes back to turn it fine, ball pops up into the covers but the man is too far back
flighted outside off, he goes to defend, ball kisses the edge and spins away past Mashud's gloves and races away for four, lucky again!
bad ball, lands way down leg, firmly swept fine for four
he moves around the wicket but again fires it way down leg, batsman goes to sweep and again paddles it down, fielder gives chase and hauls it in
bad ball, some spin on this one but it carried on too far down leg
better, more middle and leg, but he works it through square and they harry through for two, well run but was aided by some sloppy work in the deep
flatter on middle and off, worked down to long-on
shot! Banged in short, he's on to it in a flash and pulls that with disdain in the gap at midwicket, four runs
faster on middle and leg, he looks to turn it fine but mistimes it

tossed up on off, Sangakarra gets forward and turns it around the corner, they run through for a sharp single, the fielder at square leg does good work and fires in a throw, Mashud does the work, the appeal is referred but in the end he was comfortably home
flighted on off, works it into midwicket with ease
short outside off, cracks that off the backfoot to the cover sweeper
tossed up on off, steps forward and drives towards mid-on
its raining singles, works this with utmost ease from outside off to square leg
the quicker one, gets on top of it and pushes wide of cover for...yep, you guessed it, a single
short again, nicely placed in the gap at cover, ball speeds away but Ashraful covers good ground, dives, and saves four just on the ropes, well done
tossed up on off, he gives charge and heaves that over midwicket and down to Rafique in the deep on the bounce who does duty
flatter on off, pushed back past the bowler
worked from middle to square leg
flighted outside off, gets forward and pushes with soft hands in front of cover

gone! Delivered from around the wicket, good loop there on off stump and Sangakarra looks to chip it over the infield, advances but mistimes the shot and it sails high, high in the air down towards Mortaza who makes good ground at wide long-on to safely pouch it, end of Sangakkara and a breakthrough for Bangladesh after a good partnership
middle and leg, tries to work it to midwicket
sharper on on middle and leg, goes to sweep but misses, bowler appeals but in vain
middle and leg again, works it to midwicket
flighted on middle and off, Tharanga walks into the shot and drives to wide of mid-on
good ball outside off, Atapattu tamely defends, the ball hits the pads outside the line, a stifled appeal there from Rafique but thats not even going to be considered, a good over for him though
good ball outside off, driven to cover
good, straight ball on middle and off, tucked to Reza's left and he covers it well
slightly fuller and its well pushed into the gap at cover
slower and fuller outside off, Atapattu leans into it and drives straight to cover
dropped in shorter, Atapattu gives him the charge, sees it and at that slow pace has no problem in pulling it past square leg for four, off the mark in style
better ball, fuller outside off, pushed to cover again
middle and off, tucks it past square leg&
flighted on middle and off, pushed into the covers
flatter on middle and off, steps down and pushes it back towards the bowler's right
spins in from outside off, he goes to cut but misses as the ball keeps low
tossed up on off, drives down to long-off
tucks this from middle and off right to square leg
full delivery outside off, driven to cover
drifts down middle and leg, Atapattu coolly tucks that around the corner for a well-run two down to fine leg
glorious! Width offered outside off, Atapattu goes back and just slaps that past point and cover for his second four, good stroke
this ball does alot as it nips back from outside off and raps him, but well outside  the line and high over the stumps
good ball again, quicker on off and he's well on top of it with defense
fuller and dipping in from outside off, almost a low full toss but all he can do is drive it to cover
middle and leg, goes to turn it but mistimes the stroke
flatter on middle and off, worked to midwicket but no run
identical ball, this time he drives well past mid-on and down to Mortaza at long-on
sharp spin there from outside off, cut to cover
bang! Flighted outside off, Atapattu gets a foot forward and sweeps that hard over midwicket for four more
good ball, slower and he holds it back a tad, Atapattu advances and drives it airily to cover
fuller outside off, he drives that into the covers where the fielder dives and stops runs
short and moving in from off, he goes back and pushes back to the bowler's left
aggression here, short ball again, Atapattu advances down the track but gets struck on the pads, ball pops up very close to the bowler
width is there, he goes back and glides that down to third man
good-length ball outside off, punches with a high arm to mid-off
slower delivery, on middle and off, worked with a flick of the wrists past square leg
flatter on off, he gives charge again and can only drive back to Rafique
flighted on off, sweeps hard but right to square leg
just a touch shorter and he's on top of it but mistimes the pull in the gap at mid-on
good ball, flatter on off, pushed back to Rafique
middle and off, he goes back and just drops that at his feet
tossed up outside off, Tharanga goes for a very expansive drive but fails to make contact, end of a very good spell from the veteran left-arm spinner
full outside off, Atapattu goes for a big drive, gets a thick edge past Mashud who's standing right upto the stumps, ball races away to the ropes
good ball outside off again, pushed to covers
shorter in length, turned straight to midwicket
short and wide, bad ball, Atapattu goes for the cut, doesnt time it all that well but gets enough on it to beat Mortaza's dive down at third man for four more
powerful! Fuller in the zone outside off, Atapattu just tees off, golf-style,over the umpire's head for four more dead straight down the ground, good shot
good ball, slower outside off, no room to cut but Tharanga tries and gets beaten
shot! Dragged in short outside off and this time he places that superbly in the gap at point and gets closer to a hundred
moves around the wicket, drags it shorter on middle and leg, worked off the hips for a sharp single
short on middle and off, stands tall and works it to square leg
good length ball outside off, Tharanga keeps it down and the ball sort of stops at his feet, Mortaza moves in to collect
there it is! Fuller on middle and off, he coolly punches that between bowler and stumps, and Atapattu, for a quick run down towards long-on and gets his fifth ODI hundred, well-played
middle and leg, worked to square leg
outside off, tries to swing across the line but misses
dropped shorter, he pulls down to the man at deep midwicket
good ball on off, stands up and pushes that to cover
tossed up on middle and off, chips that in the air to the bowler's left, he dives and cant get a hand to it, ball runs away to long-on
fullish outside off, tries to slog but mistimes it to midwicket
bad ball, swings down leg for wide
short and wide, stands tall and slaps that to Bashar in the covers
short again on off, he uses the wrists to steal one in front of midwicket, well run
fuller outside off, he makes room and slams that past mid-off, calls for two and has to sprint back

cleaned up at the death! Mortaza finally gets his slower ball correct, lands on a good length on off, Tharanga has a weary slog across the line, misses, and loses his middle stump, well bowled but what a fine effort from Tharanga
good, quick ball on the stumps, pushes back to Mortaza's left
flighted outside off, spins away but Atapattu gets bat on that one, top-edges it away for four more
good comeback ball, spins past him, he goes to cut but is beaten
middle and off line, works it to midwicket, no chance of a run
tossed up on middle and leg, he goes for his sweep again, mistimes it down to square leg
middle and leg, Dilshan goes for a lapshot, doesnt time it well at all but gets bat on it to send it down to backward square leg fence, 250 up for Sri Lanka
short outside off, stands tall and punches that in the gap at cover-point and gets a brace
slow and a driveable length outside off, Atapattu punches past cover
slower outside off, he waits for it and works it to point
shorter ball on middle and off, Atapattu walks down, tries to dab it to the off, mistimes an inside egde between his legs and the stumps for one to square leg
bad ball, way way outside off for the 16th wide of the innings
good slower ball in the blockhole, a tip-and-run in front of mid-off for one more

got 'em! A fullish delivery on middle and off, another Sri Lankan batsman perishes trying to accelerate the run rate, Atapattu had the gap at midwicket in mind but only succeeds in mistiming his loose shot down to Reza at widish long-on, good catch and Bangladesh have a wicket
good-length ball on off, pushes with soft hands in front of point
short and wide, cut hard past point for one

Another one goes! Flatter delivery on off, gets forward and defends, ball trickles in front of point, fielder swoops in, picks it cleanly and shies in at the nonstriker's end to get Maharoof just of the crease, good fielding there
tossed up on off, pushed to cover
off stump line, pushed in front of point for one more
full on middle and off, pushed to mid-off
good length ball on off, stands tall and works it to midwicket who moves in quickly
banged in short again outside off, Dilshan quickly moves into his hook shot, ball balloons high over midwicket and lands safely in the gap, and he runs hard for his runs
short outside off, Vaas stands up and chips that in the air over midwicket, calls for two and gets it, well run
good, slower ball on the stumps, cant work it away cleanly
good, quicker ball outside off, adjusts his shot to try and pinch one in front of point, but cant
flatter outside off, some low bounce and its beats his attempt to cut

flighted on off, Vaas goes back to defend and gets rapped on the pads, Dilshan calls for one, they set off, fielder fires in a throw to the bowler who makes a hash of it, batsman was well short but Razzak couldnt take the throw well, a lucky break
gets his man! Tossed up on off, Vaas goes for a wild sweep but gets a top edge thats well held by Reza out at the deep midwicket ropes and he's got to go back as well
short on off, cut in the gap at cover
short of a good length outside off, makes room and smacks it down to long-off
this one's angling down leg, Murali moves across to off and cheekily paddles that high in the air and down to deep backward square leg for four
charges him, gives it the kitchen sink, makes zero contact but they steal a bye
short and wide, Dilshan makes room and uppercuts that superbly over point's head for four, good shot at the death
slower in the blockhole, he gets bat on that and swipes across the line past square leg

wow! Murali! Spears this one in full outside off, Murali just frees his arm and chips it high down the ground, at first it looks like it'll be held at long-off, but whats this? Murali's got enough on it to get maximum, good stroke from him!
fuller and slower in the zone, Dilshan dances down and drives towards mid-off for  one, has no issues leaving strike for Murali

dropped! A slower ball, a half-tracker almost, Murali comes down and looks to smoke it over midwicket, gets a thick leading edge down to Reza at third man who gets to it but lets it go through his fingers
came down the wicket and swung it down to widish long-on for two

pushed into the covers, sets off the run, fielder moves in and fires the throw at the striker's end, Murali is actually almost in his crease but hops in the air to avoid being hit by the ball, the throw hits the stumps, he's airborn and is run out!
good shot! Swings this from middle and off handsomely down to the deep midwicket fence, Ashraful there cuts it off just at the fence, but his foot is over the boundary and its given four

slower delivery on middle and off, slogged past square leg, ball speeds away down to the ropes, Dilshan calls for the third run, and poor thinking in the deep allows him to get it, 300 up for Sri Lanka

inn2.comm: Two slips in place and Chaminda Vaas starts off with a wide down the leg side.
hits the deck around short of length and outside off and Nafees dabs it down to third man
Ashraful starts off showing the full face of the bat in defense. It was a fullish delivery on the middle and off that swings in a bit.
Again the straight bat was presented. He had said prior to this game that he would like to build his innings. Hopefully, for Bangladesh, he will manage to do it.
leans forward to dead-bat a length delivery.
Vaas slips in another one down the leg. Is it the due factor that's causing these wild ones?
Vaas delivers his special, that has got him a few lbws in his career. Comes in from the middle and off and Ashraful pushes at it, gets an inside edge that takes the ball to long leg
starts off pinging that channel outside off, left alone
leans forward to a length delivery and defends it watchfully
Maling hurries Nafees. It kicked from a length on the off stump line, Nafees shaped up to cut but was beaten by the pace.
back of length delivery, just outside off and Nafees, feet up in the air, chops the ball down to third man
146.kmph delivery bang on target, Ashraful gets behind the line and pushes it quietly to the on side.
Again Nafees is bit hurried into his defensive stroke.  I think he misread the length a bit. It was not all that short but he hopped back and managed to keep the ball right in front of the off stump.
This time he makes the decision to go forward but pushes at it with slightly angled face of the bat and hence the ball rolls to the on side
on the off, pushed to cover point
length delivery on the off, Nafees shuffles across and pushes at it, gets an inside edge to the on side
He shuffles across again and gets right behind the line and pushes it back down the track.
on the off stump line, shapes away slightly, Nafees, yet to get his feet moving properly, seems a bit late on most of his strokes, pushes at it defensively.

Jaffa! It kicked from a length around the off stump line and veered away late. Ashraful did well ; he didn't push at it , instead played inside the line of the ball and although the ball beat the bat, its much better than taking the edge!
comes forward to a full-length delivery on the off stump line and punches it down. But he is not sure where it went, wants a run but Nafees sends him back quickly.
banged in short, ir rears up towards the ribs, Ashraful shuffles in, takes the top-hand out of the bat handle, glances it off his ribs to the fine-leg fence. Good ball and pretty well played.
on the off stump line, punched to cover
beaten outside off. Ashraful pushes at a length delivery that left him and the ball whizzes past the outside edge.

Ashraful is beaten and so is the wicketkeeper Sangakkara. It was a fullish delivery just outside the off stump and Ashraful is beaten as he is late in pushing forward. It bounces in front of Sangakkara and eludes his gloves.
gets back and across to a fullish delivery on the off and offers the full face of the bat in defense.
landed on a length around the middle, straightened and Ashraful, who had plonked his front foot across, had to play around his front pad and managed to keep that out
appeal for lbw as again that front foot is pushed a bit too much across. But Ashraful had got his bat down in time to get an inside edge.
lovely delivery that swung in late on the off stump and Nafees, again, is bit late in his defensive stroke but manages to keep that out
full and outside off, attempt to slant that one across, Nafees slashes at it, doesn't time it well and it rolls towards cover
another pacy delivery, this time on the hips, tucked to square-leg
hit the deck back of length around the off and middle stump line, Nafees hopped up, took his top-hand out of the bat-handle, punched it to point
this one veered towards the pads, Ashraful wants a single, sent back by the striker
back of length, on the middle, Nafees stays beside the line, pushes it towards point.
Swung in from just outside off, Ashraful moves smartly towards the ball, covers the swing and pushes it to cover.
Nah.. he calmly moves forward to a fullish delivery on the off to play it quietly to cover
another one on the middle, on a length and Ashraful is contend to dead-bat it away
on the leg and middle, Ashraful tucks it front of square-leg and rushes across for a quick single. There was a direct hit by Jayasuriya but Ashraful was well in
It was full swinging delivery just outside off, Nafees shuffles across and covers the swing and pushes at it.
this time he didn't cover the outswing, pushed at it inside the line and gets an outer edge that takes the ball down to third man
on the legs, worked to the on side
lands outside off and veers further away. Ashraful covers his stumps and shoulders arms
short of length delivery outside off, Ashraful is again cautious, taking his time to settle down, covers the stumps and pushes it towards point
in the channel outside off, Ashraful has a careful look at it and lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
fullish, outside off, Ashraful lets it go . He certainly is determined to hang in there and build the innings. We have seen on many a occasion go after these kind of deliveries but not today.
defended away
worked to the on side, they look for a run but fielders swoop in at midwicket region to prevent it.

Sangakkara goes airbourne to his left to take a brilliant catch. Nafees, who had looked edgy in the middle, perishes. It was fullish delivery outside off stump, swinging away and Nafees had a stab at it, got an outer edge and it would have flown between the keeper and the first slip if not for an acrobatic effort from Sangakkara. A dive he would be hoping that some photographer has captured. Would make for a nice poster.
outside off, left alone
leans forward to a length delivery on the off stump line and pushes it to the off side.

inswinging delivery on the off stump line, Aftab takes care not to get his front foot too much across, gets behind the line and plays it with the full face of the blade, out towards mid-off.  He has just faced three balls but Aftab looks to be moving his feet well.
wide outside the off stump
again, Bucknor extends his arm to signal a wide. Again wide outside the off stump
fullish, just outside off, drawing Ashraful forward. Ashraful presses forward, opens the face of the bat at the last minute to run it down to third man
moves towards a short of length delivery on the off to pat it back down the track
Malinga is losing it here. Wide outside the off stump again.
he had problems in this over whenever he tried to hurl it full, so this time he chose to hit the deck short of length on the off stump, defended away watchfully
length delivery on the off, Aftab tries to hit it on the up, through the line, gets an outside edge that takes the ball, in the air, down to the third man region
gets behind the line to push it to the on side
on the hips, Ashraful shuffles across to tuck it behind square-leg

Oh ho! cheeky! After playing calmly for 10 overs, Ashraful couldn't resist himself into doing something risky. He walks across the stumps to play a lap shot to the fine-leg fence. has he lost his patience?
again, he walks across to a slightly slower delivery and tries to repeat the lap shot but doesn't quite connect . It would be a waste if he throws it away after such a cautious start.
Aftab again moves smartly into the line and pushes the ball towards mid-on
Charges down the track to a length delivery on the off and tries to hit it on the up, through the line but gets an inside edge that takes the ball past square-leg
on the leg and middle, tries to work it to the on side, doesn't make proper contact and the ball rolls behind square-leg
starts off with a wide one outside off stump. Aftab throws the kitchen sink at it but can't reach it.
drifts down the leg side. Another wide.
speared in full and fast on the legs, hint of late in swing, and Aftab tries to flick it away but that late swing beats him. is hit on the pads.
fullish on the middle, driven to mid-on
Super shot. It was in the slot, on the legs and Aftab flicks it behind square-leg. Good use of the wrists. He has looked good so far.
Full and fast but on the legs and Aftab makes him pay. Glances it fine. Again nice use of the wrists. Fernando continues to struggle.
greedy chase outside off! but it was there to be hit. room and width and Aftab went after it but couldnt reach.
crash.... but unluckily for Aftab he found the point fielder. It was a half-volley outside off and he square-drove but ....
on the middle and leg, worked to the on side
Vaas was lucky to get away with that one. It was on the legs, Ashraful tickles it fine  but finds the short fine-leg fielder.
swinging from off and middle, bit of curve in the air and Ashraful does well to cover the swing and push it to the on side
on the leg and middle, Ashraful lets the ball come to him and flicks it past square-leg
slower delivery on the off stump line, Ashraful waits for it to arrive , pushes it to mid-off and rushes across
defended off the front foot
rearing up on the ribs, Ashraful tries to play a lap shot, trying to help it over short ine-leg but doesn't make proper contact.

ouch. banged in short and it reared at the throat of Aftab who tries to go for a hook but was very late on that stroke. Surprised by the pace.It rams into the helmet grill and runs down to the third man region. The grill must have dug into his face as Aftab is bleeding a bit. Physio is out on the ground.

Ashraful decides to walk...  short and on the hips, Ashraful tries to tickle it fine, gets a thin edge and Sangakkara pouches it moving smartly to his left. They go up in an appeal but Ashraful doesn't wait for the decision, walks back to the pavilion.
beaten outside off. It was a length delivery outside the off stump and he was caught in his crease. Just pushes at it away from his body
Maharoof starts off with a delivery that kicked from a length and Aftab was surprised by the bounce. He jabbed at it and the ball rammed into his gloves
What a reply! Aftab had enough of jabbing at deliveries kicking off a length , charges down the track and creams it over mid-off.
banged in short and outside off, Aftab tries to pull it but doesn't make contact
spearing in on the legs, attempted flick shot, no contact and the ball rolls off the pads
defended off the front foot

beaten outside off. Saqibul Hasan is again going nowhere with his feet movement. he is struck to the crease and at the last minute to maintain balance he hops towards the ball, both feet in the air. Ends up pushing inside the line
Awesome strike! It was full and on the legs, Aftab leaned forward and nonchalantly flicked it over long-leg. Super shot. Great balance.
Another one screams to the fence. This time, he went through the line, right over mid-on. This is the last Powerplay and obviously, Aftab wants to make full use of it.
spears in full, fast on the legs, attempted flick, misses and is rapped on the pads.
Aftab again is on the hunt. He tries to hit on the up and sends the ball soaring over mid-on. Not timed quite as well as the previous one but he would still get two
dabbed to third man

both the batsmen and the wicketkeeper surprised by the pace and the lift that Fernando generated. Big no-ball though. Saqibul  Hasan hopped up and swayed away at the last minute. Sangakkara jumped up, right hand stretched but just palmed the ball behind him.
on the off, pushed to cover
in the channel outside off, Aftab is beaten trying to run it down to third man
tip and run. patted a length delivery on the stumps to the on side and they run with the stroke
hit the deck short of length around the off stump line and Hasan gets behind the line to push it away to the off side
banged in short, one bouncer for the over, and Hasan ducked underneath it without too much fuss.
length delivery pushed across Hasan, the left-hand batsman, who punches it towards cover point
full, straight, on the middle and off stump line, pushed back down the track..
outside off, dabbed to third man
on a length, on the middle and off, pushed to cover
slightly back of length, on the middle, Hasan goes back and punches it down the track
oh ho! that one reared up from back of length. Pace and lift.  Hasan, initially surprised by the lift, tried to upper-cut it but doesn't connect.
cut and miss. It was short and outside off, Hasan is bit late into his cut
bouncer, ducked underneath

Big blow for Bangladesh. Aftab Ahmed falls. Sri Lanka gets another important breakthrough. It was banged in short on the middle and leg and Aftab shaped up to pull. The line and the length demanded that shot but he was bit late in his stroke, top-edged  a simple catch to Sangakkara.
defended off the front foot
The captain falls and now the ship is really rocking. It was a length delivery on the off, kicked up more than what Bashar anticipated. He ends up steering it to second slip to the opposing skipper.
comes in from the off stump line, pushed to the on side.
another one banged in short and the extra bounce catches the batsman by surprise. Another pull attempted but , again, late in the stroke.
short and rising outside off stump, Hasan tries to slash it over point, doesn't make contact. beaten by the bounce.

fullish delivery on the off, Farhad seemed to be surprised that the ball was in his half, just about manages to get his bat down in time to get a inside edge that takes the ball towards square-leg. Farhad wants a run, Hasan doesn't
beaten outside off. Farhad doesn't get behind the line, stays adjacent and tries to run it down to third man, misses.
beaten by the extra bounce. Attempts to square-drive one that kicked up from a length in the channel outside the off stump
fuller and outside off, Farhad doesn't move forward, stays there and pushes it to the off side.
much fuller, on the middle and leg and hint of late swing. Farhad ends up driving outside the line as the ball crashes into his pads.
short and outside off, Farhad stays beside the line of the ball, cuts it down to the third man region
Sri Lankan bowlers continue to extract appreciable bounce from this track. It kicked up from back of length and Farhad is beaten as he pokes tentatively at it.
Pulled to the third man fence! He tried to pull a short of length delivery from outside the off and is beaten by the extra bounce. Gets a top-edge that takes the ball soaring over third man fence...
pushed to the off side
Maharoof mixing it up well here. After pinging the back of length, he got this one fuller and on the stumps. Inside-edged on to the pads.
bang... slightly short of length and outside the off stump,  slashed past point.
right on target, on the middle, turning in, Farhad pushes at it , ball beats the bat to hit the pads
Farhad waltzes down the track and creams it over the bowler's head. Super shot.
pushed to the off side
flatter and quicker on the middle, delivered from wide of the crease, Farhad is hit on his pad as he attempts to work it to the on side
tucked behind square-leg
beaten! ripped across a offspinner and Hasan is beaten while going for a square drive
a length delivery on the middle, pushed towards mid-on
edged past the second slip. It was a leg cutter in the channel outside off, Farhad tries to hit it on the up.
Thwack! No edge this time. Flies from the middle of the bat. It was slightly short of length and Farhad is quick to push his weight on to his back foot and pulls it over midwicket.
That one flies over extra cover. It was a fullish ball outside off, line and length inviting a drive and Farhad obliged in style
slower delivery, calmly pushed towards mid-on
just outside off, Hasan punches it off the back foot to extra cover
fetched from outside off and swept past square-leg
on the legs, tucked behind square-leg
fullish on the off, driven down the ground to long-off.
flatter on the off, pushed to cover
turning in from the leg, tries to work across the line, misses and is hit on the pads
offbreak outside off, Hasan allows for it to turn and then punches it past cover
upper-cut over slips. Short and rising outside off and Hasan decides to free his arms. The extra bounce that got Maharoof couple of wickets make him give away a four

much fuller this time, on the off stump line and there is almost a run out. Hasan pushes it to right of the bowler and sets off for a run but Maharoof gets across easily to make the stop and has a shy at the striker's end but misses.
on the middle, worked to the on side
kicks from back of length, on the middle stump line and Hasan is surprised by the bounce, is rapped on his gloves
on the hips, worked to the on side.
full on off, advances and thumps that in the air down to long-on
outside off this time, leans into it and pushes into the covers
tossed up on middle and leg, uses the feet to drive past mid-on for one more
poor ball, lands outside leg and spins away
lands on leg and spins away from him, he gets the bat on it at the last moment, taps it to cover and calls for a run, they just make it in the end
tossed up on off, defended hastily

dropped! Tossed up on middle and off, Reza gives him the charge and lofts it down to long-on where Malinga moves to his left and seems to judge it well, suddenly he finds the ball dipping on him, goes forward and gets a hand to it, the ball pops out at the end and hits the ground, basically bubbled out of his hands
fullish outside off, driven to cover&
lands on a shortish length outside off and seams in, Saqibul moves quickly and pushes that in front of point
fuller this time, he drives but ends up mistiming it back to Fernando's right for one
full again, manages to dig it out, ball bounces into the ground and they steal another run in front of mid-off's nose
no ball, speared into offstump, defends it
bad, bad ball, a shocker, really, very wide down leg stump and races away, 17th wide
full outside off stump, Saqibul flashes at it and misses
speared into the ribs, he hops and tucks it to the on side but resists the run as Fernando moves across and picks it up
good ball, spins in from outside off and Reza dead bats that
similar ball, he drives in the air towards cover
tossed up on off stump, gets a good step forward and drives all along the ground to mid-off

stumped! Tossed up on middle and leg, he gives him the charge, comes out a good three feet, the ball dips on him, he swings and misses, ball rolls to Sangakarra who in a flash has the bails off, Reza tries to get his back foot in rather than the bat, but thats out by some distance, Bangladesh are five down
flighted outside off, spins in, Mashud drives back to Murali
middle and leg, looks to turn it but misses, rapped on the pad outside the line as it spins down leg
short on middle and off, moves across and looks to work it fine
wide of the pads and rightly called so
moves across to one spinning down leg and taps it fine for one
tossed up outside off, Mashud leans into it and taps that past point for a sharp two, fielder hits the stumps but he's safe
lands outside off and spins, Mashud back and across and pushes to cover
tossed up outside off, Saqibul plays for the turn but that one skids on, he drives to mid-off
off stump, pushed to point
tossed up on off, gets forward and pushes that to cover
lands well outside off and spins in, he goes back and tucks it off the pads for one
good ball, pitches outside off and spinning, he adjusts the shot to push to cover
this one lands outside off and spins in to him, he has to work fast to keep it out, tucks it well in front of square leg
edged! This one drifts away from him outside off, he pokes at it and beats the lone slip, ball runs away for four, streaky for Mashud
short on middle and leg, stands tall and punches to mid-on
flighted outside off, some turn there, Mashud doesnt get to the pitch and drives it airily towards mid-off

run out! Six down! Tossed up outside off again, he gets into his stride and taps that in front of point, calls for the run and they set off, but Jayawardene swoops in, picks and throws and hits the nonstriker's end, Mashud knows he's gone and carries on his way to the pavillion
shorter outside off, goes back and cuts that in front of point
looped outside off and spinning in, driven into the covers
dropped in short on middle and leg, Rafique onto one leg and swings that off the hips over square leg for one to the sweeper out there
tossed up outside off, beats the batsman's forward prod
the straighter one, well picked and lofted over long-off for one
good ball, spins from off and Saqibul goes back and defends back to him
flighted outside off stump, he gets forward and drives in the gap at cover
good ball on off, gets forward and uses the soft hands to tap it to cover
goes back to one that doesnt spin a lot, pushed to cover, loud call of 'NO' back to his partner
tossed up outside off, slams that in the air over cover, they come back for two
goes back to one that spins down leg, can only work it to the man at square leg
tossed up outside off, he hits that in the air towards mid-off, Dilshan dives and cant get a hand to it, would have been a stunner though
flatter and its pushed back to the bowler
tossed up, middle and off, worked to the man on the onside
flatter and fuller, pushed to the onside for a sharp single
worked to deep midwicket, Atapattu fires in a wayward throw and allows an extra run
rapped on the back foot as he goes back to one that doesnt spin, the doosra, Murali appeals but that was going over the stumps
sweeps hard and fast down to Fernando at deep backward square leg
close! A quicker delivery, lands on off and moves in, all go up in appeal, umpire Bucknor shakes his head, maybe too high? It was sure close though!
off stump line, pushed to cover
quicker outside off, goes back and punches in front of point, calls for the run
tossed up, drives to Jayawardene at mid-off
drifts to middle and leg, swept hard in front of midwicket for one more
tossed up on middle and leg, uses his feet well and drives to mid-on
goes back and drives off the back foot to Jayawardene again
drifts onto middle and leg, Rafique goes down and sweeps in the air past backward square leg for a single, he likes that shot and he'll retain strike
gives it some air on off, again he sweeps that past square leg for one
flatter on off, Saqibul gets forward and smothers the spin
more flight on this one, Saqibul gets a stride forward and defends
pitches outside off, well tossed up, and it spins sharply, called a wide
tossed up outside off stump, driven to mid-off
Rafique goes for an ambitious sweep to one outside off and misses
this time he connects with the shot and picks up one down to deep midwicket
goes back to cut a wide one but mistimes it back onto his boot

and Rafique perishes to his preferred shot! Flighted outside off, he gets down and picks that up, sweeps it flatter this time all the way down Vaas's throat at wide long-on, he judged it well and held it a couple feet inside the ropes, Bangladesh slip further towards defeat
tossed up, he unfirls a nice drive to mid-off
tossed up outside off, Mortaza pokes at it and gets beaten
flatter and in the blockhole, he gets forward and drives to mid-off, off the mark too
tossed up wide of offstump, Tharanga gets on top of it and drives to Jayawardene at mid-off
flighted outside off, poked at and gets an outside egde past where slip could have been
flatter outside off, he pokes at it and gets an edge past slip, who's in now, down to third man
goes forward to the straighter, quicker one, rapped on the pads but the ump is not interested, landed outside off
goes back to one that spins into him, pushed in front of the man at midwicket
goes back to one that doesnt spin so much, gets an inside edge narrowly close to off stump, close call
picks this one from outside off stump and powerfully sweeps it past midwicket all the way to the fence, positive stroke
goes forward and defends one on middle and off, gets an edge to the on side and he responds to his partner's call for one
goes forward and drives this one back to Jayasuriya
varies his length and Saqibul goes back and drives to mid-on
tossed up outside off, Mortaza swings his arms and chops that towards Dilshan at extra cover
flatter on middle and off, defended
tossed up again outside off, defended into the covers
outside off, pushed back to Murali
goes back and taps it to the onside, but no run
goes for a wild sweep to one that lands outside off and doesnt spin, beaten all the way
short and its cut hard towards gully, Jayawardene dives full stretch and saves runs
beats his forward prod, Sangakarra whips off the bails but he was safe
tossed up outside off, gets well forward and drives to cover
tossed up again, gets on top of it and pushes that into the covers
middle and leg, he nicely picks that up and works it through midwicket for four, extremely well-timed shot that, bisects the men at the boundary
goes forward but gets beaten by the spin
flatter on off, defended to point
short, and he goes back and cuts that into the gap on the offside
fuller on middle and off, well picked and driven to mid-on
good shot! Tossed up outside off, gives it a free swing of the arms and lofts it down the ground, one bounce and over the ropes, way to go Mortaza
over the wicket, good pace and bounce on that one, beats Saqibul's wild attempt to flay it over point
that'll be four! Good lift on that one from off stump, Saqibul goes back and drives, more like a glide off the face of the bat, and gets four past where slip should have been
now Jayawardene puts himself at slip, Saqibul defends to cover
short and rising outside off, Saqibul chases it and its called wide anyways
short again, he can only cut that to the man at point
quick delivery on the stumps, Saqibul quickly back in his defense and presents the full face of the bat
good ball on off, Mortaza forward in his defense, ball rolls in front of Jayawardene at point whos quick on this
has a wild slog and misses it completely
goes down and glides that past gully, good shot&
huge hit! Frees his arms and smokes that over wide long-on for maximum, he absolutely middled that and sent it way back into the stands! Hoo hah!
gets a full toss and slams that high over square leg, ball lands just inside the ropes, that was close to a six too, go Mortaza!
drifts to leg, he works that towards square leg and calls for the run, a good over for Bangladesh
full outside off, drives and gets an outer edge down to Fernando at third man
short and he flays that to point who fields very well
shorter on middle and off, Saqibul goes back and pushes to Dilshan at short cover
drifts to middle and leg, works that to square leg for one
full on leg stump, goes to flick it, gets the toe of the bat on it
short outside off and he can only cut it to point
welcome back, says Mortaza, who slams that over mid-off, Maharoof on the ropes manages to save four with some deft work down there
drifts down leg, Saqibul glances it fine, Sangakarra does well to stop it, but they get a run anyways and Saqibul has his maiden ODI fifty
in the blockhole, Mortaza chips that down to long-off for a single
fuller outside off, he makes room and drives on the ground to Jayawardene at cover
fuller on middle and leg, driven to mid-on for one

cleaned up with a yorker! Thats experience, son, says Vaas, who spears one in a tad slower in the blockhole, Mortaza makes room and exposes the stumps, ball shatters the base of middle, Sri Lanka strike again
rises sharply outside off, Saqibul chases it but makes zero contact
short again outside off, he gets on top of it and pushes into the covers, wants the run
and he's beaten first ball by a peach that whizzes past the bat
hurries him onto his defense, he pokes and gets an edge, Jayawardene at slip dives and saves run
beautifully bowled, lands outside off and seams away, Razzak pokes and gets beaten
middle and leg, tucked up, manages to work it fine for a sharp single to square leg
nips in from outside off and raps him high on the knee roll, Vaas is convinced he's got his man, but the ump shakes his head, hit him above the flap and perhaps missing leg stump
thats down the legs for a wide
fuller outside off and pushed into the covers
the yorker speared in again, manages to dig it out for a single
slower and fuller outside off, he goes for it all ends up and misses by a mile
in the blockhole again, he frees his arms and slams that down the ground, Maharoof moves across from long-off, slides, and saves four
shorter and its hit across the line, he's mistimed it but will get one down to long-on
a good length on middle and off, chipped over Jayasuriya at deep extra cover
fires in the yorker, well dug out in the end
fuller again, he exposes all the stumps and drives that in the gap at cover, Vaas covers good ground and fields
drifts to leg stump, he stands tall and turns that in front of square leg, calls for the run
good length ball on middle stump, hustles to defend, works that to the onside, Malinga does the fielding himself, gets to it but ends up kicking it away, allows the run
shot! Short and wide, Saqibul stands tall and cuts in the air past Dilshan at point, ball fairly speeds away for four
drifts onto middle and leg, he moves across and cheekily paddles that around the corner for four, good shot
fired in the blockhole, Razzak drives to mid-on, thats the 250 up
identical ball and Saqibul drives that wide of mid-on this time
slower ball, in the zone, he goes for the slog, gets it down to long-on
and again he unleashes that cheeky step across the stumps and turns a full toss past square leg for four, ooooh!
this time he makes room to crash that through the off side, but the balls too slow and all he can do is keep it out to cover
full in the zone, dug out back to the bowler who threatens to have a throw back, doesnt gather it as he does so
superb shot! Full in the zone again, he takes it on the full and smokes that dead straight down the ground with some power, four runs
slower ball, not as full either, Razzak goes for some sort of dandy swipe in the air down to long-on, ball falls short though

leg stump is flattened this time! Fires one in on leg, a yorker again, Razzak once more gets cheeky and walks across his stumps, fails to make contact this tump and Maharoof cleans up his leg stump, one wicket to go now!
strives for that yorker, not done too well, a low full toss outside off that Rasel fails to get a bat on
yorker again, on middle and leg, Rasel works it to midwicket for one, Sri Lanka end up victors by 37 runs, a good win for them in the opening qualifying match
